# ðŸŽ¬ Emotional Storyboard Generator for Filmmakers

An AI-powered web application that transforms film scripts into emotionally expressive storyboards using Natural Language Processing and Stable Diffusion.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **Frontend**: React with modern UI/UX
- **AI/NLP**: HuggingFace Transformers (BERT, RoBERTa)
- **Image Generation**: Stable Diffusion
- **Database**: SQLite with migrations
- **Styling**: CSS3 with modern film industry design

## Features
- Scene-wise emotion classification
- AI-generated visuals matching detected emotions
- Secure script upload and processing
- Interactive storyboard editing and rearrangement
- Database support for storing projects

## Development Notes
- Use modern JavaScript/React patterns
- Implement responsive design for all screen sizes
- Focus on user experience for filmmakers and content creators
- Ensure production-ready code quality
